description:
Kiyomiya Suzuka is a classmate of http://anidb.net/ch142873 [Otogi Morihito] and http://anidb.net/ch142875 [Wakatsuki Nico].
She has a very gentle personality but is often criticised by her family, who puts importance on practicing traditional arts, for having a poor sense.
One day she asks Nico to put a spell on her so she can impress http://anidb.net/ch149091 [her grandmother] with performing a perfect tea ceremony.
name: Kiyomiya Suzuka
